name: Bulk indexing of monitoring data on closed indices should throw an export exception

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-447fa4f2f0c5dc2a081f7e1cf6f9e4a4d01c13f7 "[xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled] setting was deprecated in Elasticsearch and will be removed in a future release. See the deprecation documentation for the next major version."
